name: GSAP Scroll Animations
author: Blueprint 8

sections.description: Two powerful animation systems: ID-based admin UI for non-technical users (13 animation types), and class-based system for developers with 20+ advanced animation effects. Includes accessibility support with prefers-reduced-motion detection.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/ and activate through the WordPress Plugins menu.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release with dual animation systems
  • ID-based animation system with admin UI (13 types)
  • Class-based animation system for developers (20+ effects)
  • Accessibility support with prefers-reduced-motion detection
  • Conditional GSAP loading for performance
  • Parallax, fade, scale, rotation, and advanced animations
  • Professional automatic update system

upgrade_notice: Initial release of GSAP Scroll Animations with dual animation systems and professional update support.
